description: metal copper-colored popcorn cart on 4 wheels; popcorn, cold drinks, peanuts stamped on sides; attendant in window; door on back; written on top in black: 'Berkshire County Savings Bank'
inscription:
Inscriptions

stamped into bottom: [ (copyright symbol) 1974/ Banthrico/ Chicago]
in black, on bottom: [ I encircled]
in shiny substance, on bottom: [K]
stamped into bottom: [BANTHRICO INC/ CHICAGO USA]
title: "Popcorn Wagon" still bank
